cast: Cast : Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes, Ben Kingsley, Caroline Goodall
movie_description: Summary : In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

cast: Cast : Robert De Niro, Ray Liotta, Joe Pesci, Lorraine Bracco
movie_description: Summary : The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mafia, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

cast: Cast : Madhavan, Simran, Rajit Kapoor, Ravi Raghavendra
movie_description: Summary : Based on the life of Indian Space Research Organization scientist Nambi Narayanan, who was framed for being a spy and arrested in 1994. Though free, he continues to fight for justice against the officials who falsely implicated him.

cast: Cast : Cillian Murphy, Emily Blunt, Matt Damon, Robert Downey Jr.
movie_description: Summary : The story of American scientist, J. Robert Oppenheimer, and his role in the development of the atomic bomb.

cast: Cast : François Cluzet, Omar Sy, Anne Le Ny, Audrey Fleurot
movie_description: Summary : After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

cast: Cast : Adrien Brody, Thomas Kretschmann, Frank Finlay, Emilia Fox
movie_description: Summary : A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

cast: Cast : F. Murray Abraham, Tom Hulce, Elizabeth Berridge, Roy Dotrice
movie_description: Summary : The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was deeply jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.

cast: Cast : Vicky Kaushal, Shaun Scott, Stephen Hogan, Amol Parashar
movie_description: Summary : A biopic detailing the 2 decades that Punjabi Sikh revolutionary, Udham Singh, spent planning the assassination of the man responsible for the Jallianwala Bagh massacre.

cast: Cast : Mel Gibson, Sophie Marceau, Patrick McGoohan, Angus Macfadyen
movie_description: Summary : Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

cast: Cast : Lin-Manuel Miranda, Phillipa Soo, Leslie Odom Jr., Renée Elise Goldsberry
movie_description: Summary : The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.

cast: Cast : Peter O'Toole, Alec Guinness, Anthony Quinn, Jack Hawkins
movie_description: Summary : The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

cast: Cast : Aamir Khan, Sakshi Tanwar, Fatima Sana Shaikh, Sanya Malhotra
movie_description: Summary : Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

cast: Cast : Sidharth Malhotra, Kiara Advani, Shiv Panditt, Pranay Pachauri
movie_description: Summary : Shershaah is the story of PVC awardee Indian soldier Capt. Vikram Batra, whose bravery and unflinching courage in chasing the Pakistani soldiers out of Indian territory contributed immensely in India finally winning the Kargil War in 1999.

movie_name: Title : Ayla: The Daughter of War
cast: Cast : Çetin Tekindor, Ismail Hacioglu, Kyung-jin Lee, Kim Seol
movie_description: Summary : Sergeant Süleyman finds a little girl on a battlefield during the Korean War. He takes her and names her Ayla. Fifteen months later, Süleyman's brigade is told they will be returning to Turkey, and he is reluctant to leave her behind.

movie_name: Title : The Wolf of Wall Street
cast: Cast : Leonardo DiCaprio, Jonah Hill, Margot Robbie, Matthew McConaughey
movie_description: Summary : Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

cast: Cast : Russell Crowe, Ed Harris, Jennifer Connelly, Christopher Plummer
movie_description: Summary : After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.

cast: Cast : Viggo Mortensen, Mahershala Ali, Linda Cardellini, Sebastian Maniscalco
movie_description: Summary : A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver for an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

cast: Cast : Bruno Ganz, Alexandra Maria Lara, Ulrich Matthes, Juliane Köhler
movie_description: Summary : Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

cast: Cast : Anthony Hopkins, John Hurt, Anne Bancroft, John Gielgud
movie_description: Summary : A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous façade, there is revealed a person of kindness, intelligence and sophistication.

cast: Cast : Maksim Munzuk, Yuriy Solomin, Mikhail Bychkov, Vladimir Khrulyov
movie_description: Summary : The Russian army sends an explorer on an expedition to the snowy Siberian wilderness where he makes friends with a seasoned local hunter.

cast: Cast : Farhan Akhtar, Deepak Singh Rawat, Japtej Singh, Divya Dutta
movie_description: Summary : The truth behind the ascension of Milkha Singh, who was scarred by of the India-Pakistan partition.

cast: Cast : Irrfan Khan, Mahie Gill, Rajesh Abhay, Hemendra Dandotiya
movie_description: Summary : The story of Paan Singh Tomar, an Indian athlete and seven-time national steeplechase champion who becomes one of the most feared dacoits in Chambal Valley after his retirement.

cast: Cast : Andrew Garfield, Sam Worthington, Luke Bracey, Teresa Palmer
movie_description: Summary : World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, serving during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

movie_name: Title : Catch Me If You Can
cast: Cast : Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hanks, Christopher Walken, Martin Sheen
movie_description: Summary : Barely 21 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man, who only revels in the pursuit.

cast: Cast : Matt Damon, Christian Bale, Jon Bernthal, Caitríona Balfe
movie_description: Summary : American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford in order to defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

cast: Cast : Emile Hirsch, Vince Vaughn, Catherine Keener, Marcia Gay Harden
movie_description: Summary : After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.

cast: Cast : Robert De Niro, Cathy Moriarty, Joe Pesci, Frank Vincent
movie_description: Summary : The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

cast: Cast : Julie Andrews, Christopher Plummer, Eleanor Parker, Richard Haydn
movie_description: Summary : A young novice is sent by her convent in 1930s Austria to become a governess to the seven children of a widowed naval officer.

cast: Cast : Chiwetel Ejiofor, Michael Kenneth Williams, Michael Fassbender, Brad Pitt
movie_description: Summary : In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.

cast: Cast : Mark Ruffalo, Michael Keaton, Rachel McAdams, Liev Schreiber
movie_description: Summary : The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.

cast: Cast : Daniel Brühl, Chris Hemsworth, Olivia Wilde, Alexandra Maria Lara
movie_description: Summary : The merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda.

cast: Cast : Richard Gere, Joan Allen, Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa, Sarah Roemer
movie_description: Summary : A college professor bonds with an abandoned dog he takes into his home.

movie_name: Title : In the Name of the Father
cast: Cast : Daniel Day-Lewis, Pete Postlethwaite, Alison Crosbie, Philip King
movie_description: Summary : A man's coerced confession to an I.R.A. bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. An English lawyer fights to free them.

cast: Cast : Don Cheadle, Sophie Okonedo, Joaquin Phoenix, Xolani Mali
movie_description: Summary : Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager, houses over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda, Africa.

cast: Cast : Anthony Quinn, Irene Papas, Michael Ansara, Johnny Sekka
movie_description: Summary : This epic historical drama chronicles the life and times of Prophet Muhammad and serves as an introduction to early Islamic history.

cast: Cast : Anatoliy Solonitsyn, Ivan Lapikov, Nikolay Grinko, Nikolay Sergeev
movie_description: Summary : The life, times and afflictions of the fifteenth-century Russian iconographer St. Andrei Rublev.

cast: Cast : Spencer Tracy, Fredric March, Gene Kelly, Dick York
movie_description: Summary : Based on a real-life case in 1925, two great lawyers argue the case for and against a Tennessee science teacher accused of the crime of teaching evolution.

movie_name: Title : The Passion of Joan of Arc
cast: Cast : Maria Falconetti, Eugene Silvain, André Berley, Maurice Schutz
movie_description: Summary : In 1431, Jeanne d'Arc is placed on trial on charges of heresy. The ecclesiastical jurists attempt to force Jeanne to recant her claims of holy visions.

cast: Cast : Adivi Sesh, Prakash Raj, Revathi, Saiee Manjrekar
movie_description: Summary : Based on the life of Major Sandeep Unnikrishnan, who was martyred in action during the November 2008 Mumbai attacks and was consequently awarded the Ashoka Chakra, India's highest peacetime gallantry award, on 26 January 2009.

cast: Cast : Benedict Cumberbatch, Keira Knightley, Matthew Goode, Allen Leech
movie_description: Summary : During World War II, the English mathematical genius Alan Turing tries to crack the German Enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians while attempting to come to terms with his troubled private life.

cast: Cast : Will Smith, Thandiwe Newton, Jaden Smith, Brian Howe
movie_description: Summary : A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career.

cast: Cast : Russell Crowe, Renée Zellweger, Craig Bierko, Paul Giamatti
movie_description: Summary : The story of James J. Braddock, a supposedly washed-up boxer who came back to challenge for the heavyweight championship of the world.

cast: Cast : Colin Firth, Geoffrey Rush, Helena Bonham Carter, Derek Jacobi
movie_description: Summary : The story of King George VI, his unexpected ascension to the throne of the British Empire in 1936, and the speech therapist who helped the unsure monarch overcome his stammer.

cast: Cast : Al Pacino, John Cazale, Penelope Allen, Sully Boyar
movie_description: Summary : Three amateur bank robbers plan to hold up a bank. A nice simple robbery: Walk in, take the money, and run. Unfortunately, the supposedly uncomplicated heist suddenly becomes a bizarre nightmare as everything that could go wrong does.

cast: Cast : Dev Patel, Nicole Kidman, Rooney Mara, Sunny Pawar
movie_description: Summary : A five-year-old Indian boy is adopted by an Australian couple after getting lost hundreds of kilometers from home. 25 years later, he sets out to find his lost family.

movie_name: Title : Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
cast: Cast : Paul Newman, Robert Redford, Katharine Ross, Strother Martin
movie_description: Summary : In 1890s Wyoming, Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid lead a band of outlaws. When a train robbery goes wrong, they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels. After considering their options, they escape to South America.

cast: Cast : Steve McQueen, Dustin Hoffman, Victor Jory, Don Gordon
movie_description: Summary : A French convict in the 1930s befriends a fellow criminal as the two of them begin serving their sentence in the South American penal colony on Devil's Island, which inspires the man to plot his escape.

cast: Cast : Donnie Yen, Simon Yam, Siu-Wong Fan, Ka-Tung Lam
movie_description: Summary : During the Japanese invasion of China, a wealthy martial artist is forced to leave his home when his city is occupied. With little means of providing for themselves, Ip Man and the remaining members of the city must find a way to survive.

cast: Cast : Ben Kingsley, John Gielgud, Rohini Hattangadi, Roshan Seth
movie_description: Summary : The life of the lawyer who became the famed leader of the Indian revolts against the British rule through his philosophy of nonviolent protest.

cast: Cast : Richard Farnsworth, Sissy Spacek, Jane Galloway Heitz, Joseph A. Carpenter
movie_description: Summary : An old man makes a long journey by lawnmower to mend his relationship with an ill brother.
